name: Crane Moose
description:
(A post submission game-breaking bug was discovered at level 3. You will not be able to continue onward past this point if you don't manage to find a way to solve the puzzle without carrying the person.)

Be the moose you've always wanted to be. A crane moose.

You are the moose that has infiltrated human society, and you've received a job at a construction company. Pilot the crane and convince your peers that you are not a moose.

EXTRA INSTRUCTIONS: Use the levers to control the crane. Press the bottom-left button to grab the items close to the hook. 

You may have to zoom out the browser to see the entire game.
